name: The Slimeking's Tower
description: The Slimeking's Tower is an action/roguelike game where you have to explore a procedural generated tower, collect over 300 different items and slay over 100 different enemies in five different gamemodes to retrieve your people's moustaches back from the Slimeking.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics Storage: 60 MB available space
